                                          interface SomeType {
  name: string
  age: number
}

interface AType extends SomeType {
  sex: string
}

const student: AType = {
  name: "Minji",
  age: 18,
  sex: "female"
}

                                          # å‡½æ•° Function

                                          å‡½æ•°é‡è½½ã€‚æ ¹æ®å‚æ•°çš„ç±»å‹æ‰§è¡Œä¸åŒçš„å‡½æ•°ã€‚

                                          const nums: string = [1, 2, 3]

// é‡è½½
function fn(param: number): number[]
function fn(param: number[]): number[]
function fn(): number[]

// å®ç°
function fn(param?: number | number[]) {
  if (typeof param === "number") {
    return nums.filter(n => n === param)
  }
  else if (Array.isArray(param)) {
    nums.push(...param)
    return nums
  }
  else {
    return nums
  }
}

                                          å®šä¹‰ this çš„ç±»å‹ã€‚å¿…é¡»åœ¨ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°å®šä¹‰ this çš„ç±»å‹ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨æ—¶å¿½ç•¥è¯¥å‚æ•°ã€‚

                                          interface OType {
  nums: number[]
  append: (this: OType, num: number) => void
}

const o = {
  nums: [1, 2, 3],
  append(this: OType, num: number) {
    this.nums.push(num)
  }
}

  el: string | HTMLElement
}

interface VueType {
  options: OptionsType
  init: () => void
}

// implements çº¦æŸ Class
class Vue implements VueType {
  options: OptionsType
  init(): void {
    // åˆå§‹åŒ– ...
  }
}

                                          # æ¥å£æ³›å‹

                                          å¦‚æœç±»å‹éœ€è¦åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨æ¥å£çš„æ—¶å€™ä¼ é€’ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å®šä¹‰æ¥å£æ³›å‹

                                          interface ResponseResult<T = any> {
  code: number
  data: T
  message: string
}

interface Info {
  id: number
  nickname: string
}

const response: ResponseResult<Info> = {
  code: 200,
  data: {
    id: 10000,
    nickname: "cholez"
  },
  message: "success"
}

const response: ResponseResult<any> = {
  code: 5001,
  data: null,
  message: "æƒé™é”™è¯¯"
}

                                          # Record

                                          å®šä¹‰å¯¹è±¡ç±»å‹æ—¶ï¼ŒæŒ‡å®šå…¶ key å’Œ value çš„ç±»å‹ã€‚

                                          interface Status {
  type: "success" | "info" | "warning" | "danger"
  value: "å¾…å®¡æ ¸" | "å·²ä¸Šæ¶" | "å·²æ‹’ç»" | "å·²ä¸‹æ¶"
}

const STATUS: Record<string, Status> = {
  inReview: {
    type: "info",
    value: "å¾…å®¡æ ¸"
  },
  onShelf: {
    type: "success",
    value: "å·²ä¸Šæ¶"
  },
  offShelf: {
    type: "danger",
    value: "å·²æ‹’ç»"
  },
  rejected: {
    type: "danger",
    value: "å·²ä¸‹æ¶"
  }
}

                                          # Omit

                                          æ ¹æ®åŸæœ‰ç±»å‹ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„ç±»å‹ï¼Œå¹¶åˆ é™¤æŸäº›å­—æ®µã€‚

                                          interface Todo {
  title: string
  description: string
  completed: boolean
  createdAt: number
}

type TodoPreview = Omit<Todo, "description">

const todo: TodoPreview = {
  title: "Clean room",
  completed: false,
  createdAt: 1615544252770
}

                                          ç»§æ‰¿çˆ¶ç±»å‹ï¼Œå¹¶ä¿®æ”¹æŸå­—æ®µã€‚

                                          interface GoodsInfoItem {
  // ...
  identity: number
  contacts: string
  skuList: null
}

// Interface GoodsInfoDetails incorrectly extends interface GoodsInfoItem.
// Types of property skuList are incompatible.
// Type object is not assignable to type null.
// error: skuList ç±»å‹ä¸å…¼å®¹
interface GoodsInfoDetails extends GoodsInfoItem {
  skuList: object
}

// ä½¿ç”¨ Omit å·¥å…·ç±»å‹åˆ é™¤å¹¶é‡æ–°å£°æ˜ skuList ç±»å‹ï¼Œç„¶åç»§æ‰¿
interface GoodsInfoDetails extends Omit<GoodsInfoItem, "skuList"> {
  skuList: {
    skuId: number
    skuPrice: number
    skuStock: number
    specification: string
  }
}
